trans-unit.source: Represents information about a SOAP fault that is specified in a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultContractAttribute" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.FaultContractAttribute" /> 특성에 지정된 SOAP 오류에 대한 정보를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: You can get a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo> objects by accessing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo> 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성에 액세스하여 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation.FaultContractInfos%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 개체 컬렉션을 가져올 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo> class exposes the action of the SOAP fault and the detail type that is serialized into the SOAP fault.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo> 클래스는 SOAP 오류로 serialize되는 세부 유형과 SOAP 오류의 동작을 공개합니다.

trans-unit.source: The action of the SOAP fault.
The detail type that is serialized as the SOAP fault detail.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 오류 세부 사항으로 serialize되는 세부 유형입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo" /> class that uses the specified action and detail type.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 동작과 세부 유형을 사용하는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.FaultContractInfo" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new FaultContractInfo from the `action` and `detail`.
Gets the SOAP fault action value.
The type of the object that is serialized as the SOAP fault detail.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 오류 세부 사항으로 serialize되는 개체의 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the serialized SOAP fault detail.
trans-unit.target: serialize된 SOAP 오류 세부사항을 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Type" />입니다.
